snippet: The Federal Reserve Bank of New York said Wednesday that it was considering selling pieces of a final special entity created to hold assets once owned by the American International Group.
abstract: The Federal Reserve Bank of New York said Wednesday that it was considering selling pieces of a final special entity created to hold assets once owned by the American International Group.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: New York Fed May Sell More of Its A.I.G. Assets
